snippet: In his last six starts, Kyle Kendrick has been a revelation, going 5-1 with a 1.49 earned run average to help the Phillies make a last-gasp playoff push.
abstract: In his last six starts, Kyle Kendrick has been a revelation, going 5-1 with a 1.49 earned run average to help the Phillies make a last-gasp playoff push.

headline.main: Kendrick, Phillies Handyman, Sparks Playoff Push as Starter
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Appreciate, Don’t Imitate, A Young Veteran Learns
